body: "Cubans, undeniably, have to find a path. We must keep one thing very present: only love can save us from human misery": Pablo Pacheco, one of the prisoners of Cuba’s Black Spring, blogs about some of his experiences while in confinement.
original_body: "Cubans, undeniably, have to find a path. We must keep one thing very present: only love can save us from human misery": Pablo Pacheco, one of the prisoners of Cuba’s Black Spring, blogs about some of his experiences while in confinement.
title: Cuba: Pacheco Blogs From Exile

sentence: "Cubans, undeniably, have to find a path.
We must keep one thing very present: only love can save us from human misery": Pablo Pacheco, one of the prisoners of Cuba’s Black Spring, blogs about some of his experiences while in confinement.
